ClassModel.XmlComment: STO data access component. Manages CRUD operations for the STO table.

MethodModel.Name: Create
MethodModel.XmlComment: Inserts a new row in the STO table.

MethodModel.Name: UpdateById
MethodModel.XmlComment: Updates an existing row in the STO table.

MethodModel.Name: DeleteById
MethodModel.XmlComment: Conditionally deletes one or more rows in the STO table.

MethodModel.Name: SelectById
MethodModel.XmlComment: Returns a row from the STO table.

MethodModel.Name: Select
MethodModel.XmlComment: Conditionally retrieves one or more rows from the STO table.
